name: Square weave
author: saidwho12
description: This is just a simple weave shader I made as a test.
image_code:
// by FabriceNeyret2 - 297 chars
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U) 
{
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,
         p =  ( 2.*U - R) / R.y
             * mat2(cos( .6*sin(iTime * 1.26)  + vec4(0,33,11,0))); // https://www.shadertoy.com/view/XlsyWX 

    p.y -= .5*iTime;
    p = fract(p)*2.-1.;
     
    vec4 t = abs( p.xyxy - .5*vec4(1,1,-1,-1) ) -.2,
         C = vec4(.95, .5,  .5 , 0);        // base color
    
    O = mat4( C, C.yxyw, C.yyxw, C.xyxw )   // colors = swap of base RGB
        * (   clamp(-300.*t, 0.,1.)                // mask
            * clamp( 1. - exp(-15.*t.yzwx), 0.,1.) // shadow
          );
}

/*
#define saturate(x) clamp(x,0.0,1.0)
#define mainImage(O,u)\
    vec2 p = fract(u/100.)*2.-1.;\
    \
    mat4 c = mat4( .95, .5,  .5 , 0,\
                     .5,  .95, .5 , 0,\
                     .5,  .5,  .95, 0,\
                     .95, .5,  .95, 0);\
    \
    vec4 t = abs( p.xyxy - .5*vec4(1,1,-1,-1) ) - .2,\
      m = saturate(-t*1e2),\
      s = 1. - saturate(exp(-15.*t.yzwx));\
    m *= s;\
    O = c * m;
*/

name: shortest quadtree 3b (246ch)
author: FabriceNeyret2
description: golfed variant of [url]https://shadertoy.com/view/lljSDy[/url]
image_code:
// golfed variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/lljSDy

void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u) {

    float r =.2, t=iTime, H=iResolution.y, i=r;
    vec2  U =  u/H, f,
          P = .5+.5* cos(vec2(t,t*.7+11.));
    for ( O.b = .25 ; ++i < 8. ;
        min(f.x,f.y) < 3.*r/H    ?  O--
    	: length(P-1.) - r < 1.4 ?
        	  f = 2.*step(1.,U),
        	  U += U - f,
        	  P += P - f,  r += r,
        	  O += .13
        : O )
        f = min( U, 2.-U ),
    length(P-U) < r ? O.gb-- : U; }             /*






// --- 250 chars ( 2018 version )

#define mainImage(O,u)                          \
                                                \
    float r=.2, t=iTime, H=iResolution.y, i=0.; \
    vec2 U =  u/H, f,                           \
         P = .5+.5* vec2(cos(t),sin(t*.7));     \
                                                \
    for ( O.b = .25; i<7.; i++ )                \
        f = min( U, 2.-U ),                     \
        min(f.x,f.y) < 3.*r/H    ?  O--         \
    	: length(P-1.) - r < 1.4 ?              \
        	  f = 2.*step(1.,U),                \
        	  U += U - f,                       \
        	  P += P - f,  r += r,              \
        	  O += .13                          \
        : O;                                    \
	length(P-U) < r ? O.gb-- : U               /*

/**/
